title: Oppai Momitai~tte Sakendara, Imouto no Tomodachi to Tsukiau Koto ni Narimashita - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Awkward Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Early Romance   Heartwarming   Honest Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Low-key Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Senpai-Kouhai Relationship   Younger Love Interests   Younger Sisters
author: Nagiki Eko   凪木エコ
description:
“I want to fondle boobs!”

The answer to his prayer was an angelic girl named Miko-chan.

“I-if I let you touch my breast, will you go out with me?”

It’s a sweet story of their daily lovey-dovey life.

Isn’t it wonderful to have a girlfriend!>
